title: Drawing, "Design for a title page or frotispiece dedicated to the Empress Maria Theresa", ca. 1742
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and ink wash
signed: G. Eichler jun. delin. Signed and dated 1742.
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: A queen is seated on a throne under a canopy, surrounded by carefully identified allegorical figures.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a title page or frotispiece dedicated to the Empress Maria Theresa", ca. 1742.
ca. 1742. Pen and black ink, brush and ink wash. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-64-136.
